stories.original_summary: For decades, scientists have believed that complex life began when two very different microbes joined forces, eventually giving rise to plants, animals, and fungi. stories.fantasy_headline: Wizards Discover Ancient Air-Loving Spirit, Key to All Life!
stories.fantasy_story: For ages, wise wizards believed all grand creatures sprang from two tiny, magical spirits joining. A great mystery was how they met if one needed the very air to breathe, and the other did not. Now, the High Alchemists have found the missing air-loving ancestor, unraveling this ancient riddle of life.

stories.fantasy_headline: Scribe's Guild Partners with Fortune-tellers for Prophecy Scrolls!
stories.fantasy_story: The esteemed Scribe's Guild has forged a new alliance with the mysterious Oracle's Den. They are crafting enchanted tools to easily share and debate whispers of fate directly on the Guild's scrolls. Furthermore, the Oracle's Den will offer gold coins to certain bards and chroniclers to use their unique prophecies.

stories.fantasy_headline: New Mana Crystal Recharges Three Artifacts at Once!
stories.fantasy_story: Adventurers on long quests often struggle with many bulky magic chargers for their enchanted tools. Now, the famed Anker Clan offers a Prime Mana Crystal that quickly recharges three magical artifacts, even powerful scrying mirrors, all at once. This portable marvel is available for a special bargain of just eighty gold coins.
